attributes.action: Immediately Introduce Emergency Universal Basic Income
attributes.background:
Millions of UK citzens have been left out of current economic policy.

Everybody MUST have enough money to manage during the Covid 19 crisis. Then, the country can unite in supporting those fighting the disease & ensuring everyone has adequate access to food & medicines whilst in lockdown.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302284

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
